name: UNIVERSAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC., petitioner, v. UNITED STATES and Massachusetts, ex rel. Julio Escobar and Carmen Correa.
name_abbreviation: Universal Health Servs., Inc. v. U.S. & Mass. ex rel. Escobar

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
UNIVERSAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC., petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES and Massachusetts, ex rel. Julio Escobar and Carmen Correa.
attorneys: Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted limited to Questions 2 & 3 presented by the petition.
casebody.head_matter:
UNIVERSAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC., petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES and Massachusetts, ex rel. Julio Escobar and Carmen Correa.
No. 15-7.
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 4, 2015.
Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the First Circuit granted limited to Questions 2 & 3 presented by the petition.
